info.name: Glific backend APis
info.description: Glific is purely APIs based. We try to create an API endpoint for all the features. Our frontend is just a user of Glific APIs.

item.name: Get a specific Contact by ID
Get a specific Flow by ID
Start flow for a group contacts
Reset flow counts for a specific flow
Get a specific Message by ID
Delete a Messages of a contact
Create and send Session Message to contacts of a collection
Send HSM Message to contacts of a collection
